title: Why The Peloton Needs to ‘Be More Tom Pidcock’
content:
In a Strade Bianche peloton resigned defeat, Pidcock refused to leave it to Van der Poel and Vingegaard to beat Pogačar – and it nearly paid off.

Read the full article at Why The Peloton Needs to ‘Be More Tom Pidcock’ on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
